verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hear the invitation Come whosoever will Praise God For full salvation For whosoever will{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All things are ready Come to the feast Come for the table Now is spread Ye famishing ye weary Come and thou shalt Be richly fed{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All things are ready Come to the feast Come for the door Is open wide A place of honor Is reserved for you At the Master's side{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All things are ready Come to the feast Come while He waits To welcome thee Delay not while This day is thine Tomorrow may never be{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All things are ready Come to the feast Leave every care And worldly strife Come feast upon The love of God And drink everlasting life{/lang-eng}
